/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a striking view of a tall, yellow apartment building in Beijing, China. The building, with its unique curved facade, stands out against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The perspective of the image is from a low angle, looking up towards the building, emphasizing its height and grandeur. The street on which the building is located is bustling with activity. Cars are parked along the sides of the street, and people can be seen walking on the sidewalks, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is a blend of urban life and architectural design, showcasing the vibrant cityscape of Beijing.
